title: Vileda Professional Premium Microfibre Cleaning Cloths, PURmicro Active, Glass Cloths, Streak-Free Multipurpose Polishing Cloths, Pack of 5, 38x35cm, Blue
features: PURMicro Active is Vileda Professional’s durable coated microfibre cleaning cloth with double cleaning power.

Premium Quality, Ultra-Soft & Scratch-Free - These highly absorbent microfiber cloths are designed for streak-free cleaning on glasses, windows, kitchenware, stainless steel, glazed surfaces, and other delicate items. Effortlessly wipe away dust and dirt without scratches or damage - with no chemicals needed.
Ensuring a spotless finish with just one swipe.

Durable & Reusable for Long-Lasting Use - Designed to withstand multiple washes, Vileda’s microfiber cloths are eco-friendly and built to last. Reinforced edges ensure they stay in top shape, making them perfect for professional cleaning and everyday use.
Care Instructions - Avoid bleach and fabric softeners, as they can damage the microfiber structure and reduce cleaning performance.
Multi-Purpose Cloth - Measuring 38cm x 35cm, suitable for both wet and dry use.
description: From the manufacturer PURmicro Active Vileda Professional Cloth Vileda Professional is once again setting the trend in the cleaning sector with the launch of PURMicro Active. PURmicro Active: Double Cleaning Power The premium cleaning cloth with microbibre and a durable PUR coating from Vileda Professional. High-performance microfibres allow for good liquid absorption and particle pickup for brilliant cleaning results. The additional PUR (Polyuretance) coating increases the streak-free rinsing and cleaning capacity. With a single wipe you get double the cleaning power. For cleaning any surface It can handle any smooth and washable surface. A single cloth allows for streak-free cleaning, especially on shiny surfaces such as glass and stainless steel, marble, tiles and many others. It is the ideal cloth for any professional who wants to have the best cloth in their hands, to get brilliant results in a quick and easy way. Microfibre The high-performance microfibres allow great absorption of liquids and the collection of particles for perfect cleaning results. PUR Coating The cloth’s exterior is coated with polyurethane (PUR). This coverage provides extra drag on the surface and dries much quicker. One colour per use Although it is multi-purpose, it is better to avoid the risks of cross contaminating dirt in areas and to use different colours for different areas. Chemical-free Its microfibre allows you to clean without chemicals. Do not use bleach or fabric softeners because they damage the structure of the cloth. PURMicro Active Cloth – Available in 5 Colours Each colour should be used in different areas and according to its individual cleaning protocol. This is ideal so to reduce the risk of cross contamination and adapt to a hygiene plan. For example: PURMicro Active Blue: For glass surfaces Each colour should be used in different areas and according to its individual cleaning protocol. This is ideal so to reduce the risk of cross contamination and adapt to a hygiene plan. For example: PURMicro Active Green: For furniture PURmicro Active Cloth - Available in 5 Colours Each colour should be used in different areas and according to its individual cleaning protocol. This is ideal so to reduce the risk of cross contamination and adapt to a hygiene plan. For example: PURMicro Active Yellow: For the bathroom Each colour should be used in different areas and according to its individual cleaning protocol. This is ideal so to reduce the risk of cross contamination and adapt to a hygiene plan. For example: PURMicro Active Red: For toilets or areas of higher contamination risk PURmicro Active Blue Cloth PURmicro Active Green Cloth PURmicro Active Yellow Cloth PURmicro Active Red Cloth
